headline: Intuit Partnerships With Affirm And Checkr Test QuickBooks Moat And Valuation
summary: Intuit (NasdaqGS:INTU) has entered multi year partnerships with Affirm and Checkr to expand QuickBooks capabilities for small business customers. The Affirm integration will bring pay over time options into QuickBooks Payments, while the Checkr collaboration will embed background checks directly into QuickBooks Online Payroll and Intuit Enterprise Suite. Intuit, trading at $443.77 at the last close, is rolling out these product partnerships at a time when the share price has seen a 29.5%...
